The Sinhala: language caption of the post translates to English as: "An incident that occurred in Jaffna… Those who have an issue with young Buddhist monks being ordained seem to have lost their words over this…"
The photo was published on multiple Face: 4. A reverse image search found that the photo was published on a Tamil-language news website on August 6, 2018, with a headline stating: "Action against parents for puncturing children." The article mentions the Children's Rights Commission taking action against parents who stabbed children in the name of religious rituals and states that child protection services were made aware of the ceremony after the father of the children posted the photo on Facebook.
